en:
Move paddle@ [←][→] or [Mouse]
Release ball@ [{input_keyboard_release}] or [{input_mouse_release}]
Reset ball (-1 life)@ [{input_keyboard_reset}]
Pause game@ [{input_keyboard_pause}]

Exist in two variants - basic and sturdy.
Basic blocks break after {block_health} hit, sturdy ones after {sturdy_block_health}.

Destroy all to complete a level.

Exist in two variants - basic and sturdy.
Basic one can't be broken, sturdy breaks after {sturdy_barrier_health} hits.

Barriers don't count towards level completion.

Increases by 1 for every {combo_multiplier_step} destroyed elements, up to {max_combo_multiplier}.
Grabbing difficulty increasing pickups (small/fast ball, smaller paddle) also increases multiplier independent of combo.
Max score multiplier@ x{max_score_multiplier}.
